title: What caused the 'unusual' giant hail that smashed south-east Queensland
description: Hailstones of up to 8 and 9 centimetres hit parts of Queensland over the weekend. What caused them to be so large?
content:
Over the weekend, parts of south-east and southern Queensland were pummelled by giant hailstones, which measured between 8 and 9 centimetres in the hardest-hit areas.
